name: ONEarth2019
description:
Mouse to control the ship. Shooting is automatic when you're near targets. LMB gives you a temporary speed boost. T to turn off Trail-effects if there's performance issues. R may restart the game.

If you don't want any traces left of the game on your machine, you can delete the highscore-file that the game saves to appdata/local/onespacejam

Submission from Eero Höök / Roikku / Lake Dead (for GMTK Game Jam 2019 August 2nd, at 8PM UK time, to August 4th, at 8PM UK time.) version 0.0.0.3
